reviewText: Too bad Hugh Grant made so many lousy movies.  The only one worth watching, in my opinion, is "The Man Who Went Up a Hill and Came Down a Mountain". Charming movie.  The rest, not so much....
Title: Hugh Grant Collection

reviewText: that someone doesn't pick Hugh Grant's movies very well. Soft porn in one and largely disappointing plots in the others. Rent them before you buy.
Title: Hugh Grant Collection

reviewText: 4 stars cause 3 of the movie where great.. I love the bbc movies  and hugh grant is wonderful..this has nice sences in it and i would buy again...
Title: Hugh Grant Collection

reviewText: His ability to make trivial things seem important is hopelessly romantic. It is a wonderful series of movies, based on love and luck.
Title: Hugh Grant Collection

reviewText: Not one that I would recommend to friends.  Had it's moments of good viewing.  However,  I am sure there would be many that thoroughly enjoy it.
Title: Hugh Grant Collection

reviewText: I gave this collection 3 stars because the films surprised me. I had a hard time between the image I had of Hugh Grant, and with the type of films these were. There was quite a mixture of nudity, sex, fantacy and dark witchcraft in this collection. I prefer the lighter romantic type rolls he has played in other films.
Title: Hugh Grant Collection

reviewText: I liked two of the movies but it was disappointing in that I thought two of the movies not up to Hugh Grants somewhat humorous, bashful style.  The plots were no great literary writing and were boring.
Title: Hugh Grant Collection

reviewText: What's not to love!  Having all these movies together on one DVD is great!I watched them in a marathon!
Title: Hugh Grant Collection

reviewText: I didn't expect them to be as old as these, but I guess you didn'tsay they were new ones.Not too bad anyway.
Title: Hugh Grant Collection

reviewText: None of the movies were that good.  I hadn't realized he was in this many boring movies.  If you love Hugh Grant in any thing, no matter how boring, you will probably enjoy these movies.
Title: Hugh Grant Collection
